statements: SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT employee_id, hand_width, hand_length FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE clock_in_time >= '2021-08-01';
SELECT employee_id, clock_in_time, clock_out_time FROM hand_geometry_measurements ORDER BY clock_in_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY hand_length ASC, hand_width DESC;
SELECT employee_id, hand_width, clock_out_time FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 15 AND hand_width < 10;
SELECT AVG(hand_length) as avg_length, MAX(hand_width) as max_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, clock_in_time, clock_out_time) as work_duration FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT employee_id, COALESCE(hand_width, 0) as available_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE clock_in_time > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY clock_in_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_hand_geometry;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE hand_length > 10;
SELECT name, department FROM employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE clock_out_time IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, position FROM employee ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT name, department FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager'
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM employee_hand_geometry ORDER BY hand_length ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE hand_length > 10 AND hand_width < 5
SELECT employee_id, clock_in_time FROM employee_hand_geometry WHERE clock_in_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT hand_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT employee_id, measurement_time, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_clock_in WHERE clock_in_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, clock_out_time FROM employee_clock_out ORDER BY clock_out_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_clock_in WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY clock_in_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, clock_in_time FROM employee_clock_in WHERE clock_in_time >= '2022-01-01' AND clock_in_time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT clock_out_time, employee_id FROM employee_clock_out WHERE clock_out_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT hand_id, hand_length FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 15 ORDER BY hand_length ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_clock_out WHERE employee_id = 200 AND clock_out_time >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY clock_out_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10;
SELECT id, employee_id, clock_in_time, clock_out_time FROM clock_in_out ORDER BY clock_in_time DESC;
SELECT name, department, role FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT id, name, department FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10;
SELECT e.name, e.role, d.name as department FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.id;
SELECT id, employee_id, clock_in_time, clock_out_time FROM clock_in_out ORDER BY clock_in_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT thumb_length, finger_length FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10;
SELECT clock_in_time FROM clock_in_times WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10.5;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT department_name, employee_name FROM departments JOIN employees ON departments.department_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT AVG(hand_width) AS average_hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT * FROM clock_in_times WHERE clock_in_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
